title: Trump travels to UK for second state visit as president
shortDescription: Trump and first lady Melania visit Windsor Castle on Wednesday and meet with the Prince and Princess of Wales, William and Catherine.

title: President Trump clashes with press before UK visit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump defended his business dealings and lashed out at reporters over hate speech ahead of his UK visit.

title: Melania Trump wears Burberry trench coat
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump donned a floor-length Burberry trench coat while departing the White House with President Donald Trump.

title: Trump postpones TikTok ban deadline for fourth time. Here's when.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed a fourth executive order on Tuesday, Sept. 16 to extend the deadline on a ban against TikTok.

title: Eric Trump coming out with a new memoir, president shares congrats
shortDescription: Eric Trump, one of President Donald Trump's first sons, wrote a book about being part of his famous family. "Under Siege" release date is Oct. 14, 2025

title: Trump sues the New York Times, latest in series of media lawsuits
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has announced a series of lawsuits against media companies. In the latest, he claims $15 billion in damages for defamation.

title: Trump to mix pageantry with nuclear energy push in state visit to UK
shortDescription: President Trump left for the United Kingdom on Tuesday. He will mix the pageantry of a state visit with policy efforts to expand nuclear energy.

title: Conor McGregor withdraws bid in Irelandâ€™s presidential election
shortDescription: Mixed martial arts fighter Conor McGregor has announced he is withdrawing from the race for the Irish presidency.

title: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz launches 2026 reelection bid
shortDescription: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz will seek reelection in 2026. He made the announcement Tuesday, Sept. 16.

title: Viral video appears to show Trump saying 'smart people don't like me'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appeared to speak at a Hope Through Education gala according to a video posted online. 'Smart people don't like me,' he said.

title: Who is TikTok's American buyer? Trump says US will announce soon
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters on Tuesday, Sept. 16 that TikTok will keep running in the U.S. and a buyer of the app will be announced soon.

title: Trump, Epstein photo displayed in UK
shortDescription: A giant photo of President Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein was put on display outside of UK's Windsor Castle ahead of Trump's state visit.

title: Georgia DA Fani Willis can't prosecute Trump after appeal rejected
shortDescription: The Supreme Court of Georgia rejected an appeal from Fulton County DA Fani Willis over being disqualified from prosecuting President Donald Trump.

title: Trump sues New York Times for $15 billion
shortDescription: Donald Trump files $15 billion lawsuit against the New York Times and four of its reporters for defamation claims.

title: Trump sues The New York Times for defamation and libel, seeks $15 billion
shortDescription: Trump threatened last week to sue the New York Times for its reporting on an allegedly sexually suggestive note and drawing given to Jeffrey Epstein.
